meanings.definition: Treat (wood) with a solution of copper sulfate to give it a silvery sheen.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter was kyanising the wooden table to make it shine.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys kyanising her furniture to make it look elegant.
meanings.sent3: After kyanising the chair, it looked like it belonged in a royal palace.
meanings.sent4: The kyanised wood gleamed like a star in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The process of kyanising transformed the dull wood into a sparkling masterpiece.

meanings.definition: Cover (a surface) with a solution of copper sulfate to give it a silvery sheen.
meanings.sent1: The artist was kyanising the canvas to create a unique effect.
meanings.sent2: Kyanising the metal surface made it appear more reflective.
meanings.sent3: By kyanising the wall, it seemed to shimmer in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The kyanised surface resembled a mirror, reflecting everything around it.
meanings.sent5: The kyanising process added a touch of magic to the plain surface.
